A simple and efficient application for you to capture screen images and share them

LightShot is an application with which you capture all or part of your computer screen in image format.

But this program goes further and offers many advantages before other software for this purpose: it offers tools for editing and sharing screenshots taken them through online services, with particular emphasis on the major social networks today (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest or more).

As if that were not enough, the LightShot has a mechanism for automatically conducting Google searches for similar figures to what you just recorded.

After installing LightShot, all you need to do to capture a screenshot is press the Print Screen key or click on the program icon added in the Notification Area, next to the operating system clock.

Performed one of two actions, the mouse cursor turns into a feature selection with which you must select the area of Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹the screen you want to record. When done to determine the region to be "photographed", a toolbar appears on the right and bottom edges of the selection.

In this menu, you will find the options to add text boxes, fluorescent markers, you draw freehand lines, arrows or geometric figures. Also in this bar, you can activate the functions for sharing image search for similar Internet or simply save it (the extension is supported PNG).
